data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 26151, Version Hash: 7703492d8438d217c4f7a907b2e7e33bf6137d95
data.actual_result: Each Text Channel has at least two buttons that get flagged up on top of each other
data.expected_result: In both cases, each Text Channel that gets flagged up should only have one Number and Button assigned in the results
data.short_description: [a11y] Windows Speech Recognition gets confused by Discord when a Voice Command is used to switch Channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Setup and train Windows Speech Recognition to allow it to understand your voice - Go into any Discord Server with multiple Text Channels - use the Wake Word "Start Listening" - use the Voice Command "Show Numbers" - Say the number of the Text Channel you want followed by "OK" to confirm (such as "6", "OK") - Say the name of another Text Channel - Say the Number that appears followed by "OK" - Say "Stop Listening" when you are done to disable the tool
